definitions.definition: Any tall-stemmed plant principally from genus Solidago (also Oligoneuron ), usually with clusters of small yellow flowers.
A golden-yellow colour, like that of the goldenrod plant.

main_definition: Any tall-stemmed plant principally from genus Solidago (also Oligoneuron ), usually with clusters of small yellow flowers.
secondary_definitions: A golden-yellow colour, like that of the goldenrod plant.
